title: League of AD
body:
What's being done to bring AP casters, and more importantly, non-burst AP casters, back into play?

It feels like the game is revolving entirely around 100 to 0'ing a target in 3 seconds, and champions who can't do this have fallen out of play.

As a side effect, this shift in focus severely reduces skill requirement, as burst champions snowball hard, and it's extremely hard to outplay someone who can more or less instantly kill you if they engage first.
